Package org.apache.archiva.metadata.repository

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MetadataRepository
    A Metadata repository provides information about artifact metadata.
    MetadataResolver  
    RepositorySessionFactory  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMetadataRepository  
    AbstractRepositorySessionFactory
    Implements just the open/close methods in a concurrent safe manner.
    DefaultMetadataResolver
    Default implementation of the metadata resolver API.
    MetadataService  
    RepositorySession
    The repository session provides a single interface to accessing Archiva repositories.
    RepositorySessionFactoryBean  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MetadataRepositoryException  
    MetadataResolutionException  
    MetadataSessionException
    Exception thrown if the session method fails.
